title: 2010/363/: Commission Decision of 28 June 2010 on the recognition of Algeria as regards education, training and certification of seafarers for the recognition of certificates of competency (notified under document C(2010) 4226)
header:
30.6.2010 EN Official Journal of the European Union L 163/42
COMMISSION DECISION
of 28 June 2010
on the recognition of Algeria as regards education, training and certification of seafarers for the recognition of certificates of competency
(notified under document C(2010) 4226)
(2010/363/EU)
THE EUROPEAN COMMISSION
main_body: Algeria is recognised as regards education, training and certification of seafarers, for the purpose of recognition of certificates of competency issued by this country.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
This Decision takes effect from the date of its notification to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 June 2010.
For the Commission
Siim KALLAS
Vice-President
(1)  OJ L 323, 3.12.2008, p. 33.
(2)  Adopted by the International Maritime Organisation.
